youtube.title: How Endovenous Laser Therapy (EVLT) Works | Varicose Vein Treatment
youtube.description: Explore the science behind Endovenous Laser Therapy (EVLT). This video demonstrates how doctors use targeted laser energy to treat varicose veins with minimal downtime.
